comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Your links needs to be edited manually when there is a terminal period in a Wikipedia name. The HTML editor assumes the period belongs on the outside of the tag. You need to put it back in by hand after you save the tag: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_T._Marye,_Jr.

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Oh yeah!  Never noticed that before.  Thanks for putting the right one here.

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: pennylrichardsca: thank you for the additional information on George T. Marye, Jr. There are other photographs of him in the Prints and Photographs Online Catalog from the Harris & Ewing Collection: www.loc.gov/pictures/item/hec2008003220/ and www.loc.gov/pictures/item/hec2009006910/ Another Bain photo shows "Mrs Geo. T. Marye", perhaps his wife: www.loc.gov/pictures/item/ggb2005019922/ We will add more information to the image description when we update.
